title: Breath
data: {{version030}} {{flavour|You are catching your breath, and are unable to use your innate breath ability until the status expires.}} '''Breath''' is a [[status effect]] which prevents the use of breath- or spit- based attacks for its duration, effectively acting as a cooldown. It does not impact [[spell]]s or any other type of ability. The following player abilities cause and are affected by Breath: *[[Draconian breath attacks]] from being an XL 7 [[Draconian]] (1 + 1d10 + 1d(30 - XL) turns{{source ref|0.30.1|ability.cc|2541}}) **The [[Fire Breath]] attack from being in [[Dragon Form]] (same duration) *The [[Spit Poison]] attack from being a [[Naga]] (3-7 turns{{source ref|0.30.1|ability.cc|2518}}) Monsters may also gain the Breath status; any spell with the [[spell slot flag|breath flag]] is subject to a Breath cooldown. Examples of monsters with breath spells include [[dragon]]s and [[ironbound convoker]]s. For monsters, Breath always lasts for 1-5 turns.{{source ref|0.30.1|mon-cast.cc|4516}} ==References== [[Category:Status effects]]
